name: Clash of Zombies- Match 3 Adventure
description:
Remember Games like Pac Man with Arcade like graphics and maze’s .
If you loved those, you will think this is great! Gives you that old school arcade feeling
Find your way through the many levels with your ninja who will collect everything in sight
-Collect items, (treats, power ups, lives)
-Feed naruto
-Don’t let the bad guys get you or you gone…
- Perfect for all ages
-Kids love it!
-High Score Leader Boards
